Both films are great choices for immersing yourself in stories about the United States. Enjoy your movie time!

If you're more interested in language and modern warfare, "Proof of Life" (2000) might appeal to you. It features Russell Crowe as a professional negotiator trying to save his wife from guerrillas in South America. The dialogue is sharp, and the tension is palpable throughout the movie.
